STATE v. HALL No. COA06-1436. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 19, 2007 Certification Date July 9, 2007. Appeal from Jackson (04CRS52614, 04CRS52615, 04CRS52616, 04CRS52618, 04CRS52619, 04CRS52620, 04CRS52621, 04CRS52624, 04CRS52625, 05CRS3352, 05CRS922).

Case reported without published opinion. No error.
